backend/main.mo: Defines an actor storing written answers in a Map and exposes functions to save an answer and retrieve all answers.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration from old rating-based answers to new text-based answers by converting stored records.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features, associated frontend files, components, and test IDs with high‑confidence evidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains short summaries of multiple frontend files describing their roles in the app.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based styles and warm color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app and setting metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component managing view switching and providers for theme and React Query.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout component providing hero section, navigation, main content container, and footer.
frontend/src/components/QuestionCard.tsx: Renders questions with a textarea answer input, navigation controls, validation, and save handling.
frontend/src/components/StarRating.tsx: Empty or placeholder star rating component file.
frontend/src/data/loveQuestions.ts: Exports a list of 18 love‑themed questions with stable IDs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches the backend actor, refreshing it when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAnswers.ts: React Query hook that fetches all saved answers from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useSaveAnswer.ts: Defines a React Query mutation to save a written answer via the backend actor, with validation and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures global Tailwind styles, custom color variables, and theme settings for light and dark romantic UI styling.
frontend/src/lib/dateFormat.ts: Exports a helper to format timestamps into a readable date string using US locale options.
frontend/src/lib/questionNavigation.ts: Provides utility functions for navigating between questions sequentially or randomly.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/views/SavedAnswersView.tsx: Renders a list of saved answers with loading/error states, sorting by timestamp, and romantic-themed UI elements.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and plugins to support the romantic design system.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project state, features, requirements, and development context.
